name: Teyvat Charred Egg
effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.
description: Bennett's specialty. For some reason, every single fried egg is a little burnt around the edges. That said, the burnt crisp does lends a whole new flavor to the dish.
source: Bennett's specialty dish from cooking Teyvat Fried Egg.
